titles.title: To amend the Equity in Educational Land-Grant Status Act of 1994 to add the Eastern Oklahoma State College on behalf of the Choctaw Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forestry, Resource Conservation and Research.

bill.summary: 5/12/1998--Introduced. Amends the Equity in Educational Land-Grant Status Act of 1994 to add the Eastern Oklahoma State College, on behalf of the Choctaw Nation, to the list of institutions to be considered as land-grant colleges established for the benefit of agricultural and mechanical arts and eligible to receive specified funds.
